data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Hammarland. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hammarland, Åland
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Hammarland, Åland to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Hammarland to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Hammarland unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Hammarland, Åland know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Hammarland.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Hammarland, Åland.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hammarland, Åland has a population of 1,600.

We estimate Hammarland has 19 people who might know Jesus, 1,570 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 84 neighbors who need Jesus.
